This test verifies the dimensions of the visual viewport returned by the JS visual viewport API.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


    **** Initial visual viewport dimensions *****
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollTop is 0
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollLeft is 0
PASS window.visualViewport.clientWidth is 800
PASS window.visualViewport.clientHeight is 600
PASS window.visualViewport.pageScale is 1
    **** Viewport dimensions after scale and scroll *****
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollTop is 10
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollLeft is 10
PASS window.visualViewport.clientWidth is 400
PASS window.visualViewport.clientHeight is 300
PASS window.visualViewport.pageScale is 2
    **** Writable viewport dimensions *****
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollTop is 20
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollLeft is 0
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollTop is 0
PASS window.visualViewport.scrollTop is 20.5
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
